prompts.text: Equilibrium leans yes, but only with clean stoichiometry.
Activation energy looks high. Warm it and ask again.
Solvent dependent result. Polar medium favors progress.
pH sensitive state. Buffer before trust.
Enzyme mood: cooperative, but not guaranteed.
Entropy favored path, kinetics still negotiates.
Signal is noisy. Collect one more spectrum.
Current state: maybe, pending better mixing.
Triple collision event. Rare yes with caveats.
Near-perfect rest detected. Quiet no, maybe reversible.
Long vortex observed. Outcome swirls toward yes.
